taskbody.context: Before taking a screenshot, turn all tags off (Oxygen).

step.cmd: When you have definitively identified a duck, make a note in your guide.

stepresult.p: You’ll now have a record you can keep for the rest of your life.

steps.stepsection: Once you’ve identified the duck, you can spend some time noting its behavior.

step.note: Don’t disturb the ducks while observing their behavior; they behave differently when humans are present.
step.cmd: Watch how the ducks interact with one another, what they’re eating, or how and when they preen.
